There were no other sightings in Mumbai on or around February 15th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was like everyday i am walking in park and enjoying cool & clear weather of winter. i just saw sky because i like to watch stars but that day i saw flag kide of lighr on the north west side in sky its not small like star but it is clear and continus shining on that same spot. first i thought that it must be any satilite but then after 10min i feel strange about that because nobody cannot saw satilite by eyes and also it mut not as big as that object yes it is a strange object. but i dont understand what to do for it so i kepp silent.i was there for 45min & that object i saw for 40 to 44min atlist continusly.please do help me out to find what is it was? was it any ufo?
Summary: it was like flag lighting but in rectagular shape lighting in sky
